typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PAAPEAID as decimal(38,18),
		PAASPBUSNDIV as decimal(38,18),
		PAAFUNCT as decimal(38,18),
		PAACNAME as string,
		PAAREVCNAME as string,
		PAACFAX as string,
		PAACPHONE as string,
		PAACTELEX as string,
		PAAINTNOTE as string,
		PAACONTCNAME as string,
		PAAWWW as string,
		PAAINTNET as string,
		PAACNAME2 as string,
		PAALCNAME as string,
		PAASCNAME as string,
		PAACADDRESS1 as string,
		PAACADDRESS2 as string,
		PAACADDRESS3 as string,
		PAACADDRESS4 as string,
		PAACADDRESS5 as string,
		PAACADDRPOSTAL as string,
		PAACADDRCOUNTRY as string,
		PAALONGNAME as string,
		PAACONTMOBCPHONE as string,
		PAACONTCPHONE as string,
		PAACONTPEAID as decimal(38,18),
		PAACONTEMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
